title: Biomes & Dimensions
description: Explore the diverse worlds and dimensions of Minecraft!

questions.question: How many dimensions are there in vanilla Minecraft?
questions.explanation: Minecraft has 3 dimensions: the Overworld, the Nether, and the End!

questions.question: Ancient Debris is found in the Nether.
questions.explanation: Ancient Debris spawns in the Nether and can be smelted into Netherite Scraps to make Netherite gear!

questions.question: What biome do Mooshrooms spawn in?
questions.explanation: Mooshrooms only spawn in the rare Mushroom Fields biome, which is also the only biome where hostile mobs don't spawn!

questions.question: What structure in the End contains Elytra?
questions.explanation: Elytra are found in End Ships, which float near End Cities in the outer End islands!

questions.question: The Deep Dark biome contains the Warden.
questions.explanation: The Deep Dark is home to the terrifying Warden, one of the strongest mobs in Minecraft!

questions.question: What Nether biome is made of blue fog and warped fungi?
questions.explanation: The Warped Forest is a cyan/blue biome with warped fungi. It's the safest Nether biome since Endermen are the only hostiles!

questions.question: Where do you find Axolotls?
questions.explanation: Axolotls spawn in Lush Caves underwater. The blue variant is the rarest!

questions.question: You need Ender Pearls and Blaze Powder to make Eyes of Ender.
questions.explanation: Eyes of Ender are crafted from Ender Pearls and Blaze Powder, and are needed to find and activate the End Portal!
